mapper.select: SELECT su.sub_year,su.semester,st.subject_id,su.name,pr.name,su.type,gr.grade,gr.grade_value FROM stu_sub_tb AS st INNER JOIN subject_tb AS su ON st.subject_id = su.id INNER JOIN professor_tb AS pr ON su.professor_id = pr.id INNER JOIN grade_tb AS gr ON st.grade = gr.grade INNER JOIN student_tb AS stud on st.student_id = stud.id WHERE st.student_id = #{studentId};
